articles.description: Vedanta Ltd. on Thursday said the meeting of committee of directors will be held next week to consider the proposal for issuance of non-convertible debentures on a private placement basis.
articles.content: "The company proposes to hold a meeting of its duly constituted Committee of Directors on Tuesday, December 19, 2023 to consider the proposal for issuance of NCDs on a private placement basis," Vedan… [+26 chars]

articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.title: Hyderabad real estate soars: 44220 homes sold, Rs. 35802 Cr in 9 months - Telangana Today
articles.description: Compared to same period last year, the value of homes sold had gone up considerably in the first nine months of year 2023.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: LIC Cards, IDFC First Bank, Mastercard collaborate to launch co-branded credit card - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Both variants of the card will offer travel benefits, such as complimentary access to lounges at airports and railway stations, and various protective covers such as personal accident insurance, the statement added.
articles.content: IDFC First Bank, LIC Cards, and Mastercard on Thursday announced their collaboration to launch an exclusive co-branded credit card to meet the dynamic financial needs of the country. Available in two… [+1549 chars]

articles.title: Multibagger stock hits 5% upper circuit after it received an order worth ₹ 1617 Cr from Railway Ministry - Trade Brains
articles.description: On Thursday, shares of India's leading Indian manufacturer of railway freight cars jumped 5 percent after receiving a Rs 1,617 crore order from the Ministry of Railways.
